content.body:
Here's another reminder:   Please fill in the delegate survey to help guide the July plenary that could happen in SF.  It takes less than one minute.  22 people have completed it so far.

https://github.com/tc39/Reflector/issues/434

content.body:
Also, we have a proposed date change for the September plenary (originally Sept 13-16) to be Sept 6-9.  Please vote on whether we accept this.

https://github.com/tc39/Reflector/issues/432#issuecomment-1124716392
